summary: The ego vehicle is approaching an intersection at night. There are other vehicles on the road. A cyclist suddenly appears from the left side of the road, crossing the intersection.
actions: Ego vehicle is driving straight. Other vehicles are also moving. A cyclist is crossing the road from left to right.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, other vehicles, cyclist, intersection, traffic lights
next_action: Ego vehicle will likely need to brake to avoid collision with the cyclist.
